title: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Owarinaki Toki no Monogatari
alternative_title: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: The Never-Ending Tale of Time, 魔神英雄伝ワタル　終わりなき時の物語
description: The story is about a 9-year-old boy named Wataru Ikusabe who is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Sokaizan which he is supposed to save. He also befriends many of the Soukaizan natives, and forms some very strong friendship bonds.
